sentences.en: She refused to lay the blame on any one party.
sentences.cn: 她拒绝归罪于任何一方。

sentences.en: No one party is expected to gain an outright majority.
sentences.cn: 没有任何政党可望获得绝对多数。

sentences.en: One party could emerge from the scrummage with a decisive victory.
sentences.cn: 一个政党可能在这场混战中获得决定性的胜利。
